title: Handle a Returned Payment (NSF)
description: A customer's automatic EFT payment was returned for Non-Sufficient Funds (NSF).

tasks.description: Receive the NSF notification from the bank.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system automatically flags the customer's account for a returned payment.

tasks.description: Add any applicable NSF fees to the customer's account balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system adds a $25 NSF fee to the amount due.

tasks.description: Notify the customer of the returned payment, the fee, and the risk of cancellation if payment is not made.
tasks.expected_outcome: An automated email and letter are sent to the customer explaining the situation.
